verbs.description: [ARG0: iranian president] [V: slams] [ARG1: sanctions] warns of ‘ war situation’ iran greeted the re - imposition of u s sanctions on monday with air defense drills and a statement from president hassan rouhani that the nation faces a war situation raising mideast tensions as america maximalist approach to the islamic republic takes hold the sanctions end all economic benefits america had granted tehran for its 2015 nuclear deal with world powers though iran for now continues to abide by the accord that saw it limit its enrichment of uranium while at the moment not threatening to resume higher enrichment iranian officials in recent months have made a point to warn the controversial process could resume at any time faster than before country paramilitary revolutionary guard iran gen habibillah sayyari rudy giuliani air defense systems national army saddam hussein tehran president president hassan rouhani america united states president trump
